faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.desc: Quick answers about ASMS storage services and policies.

items.q: What storage unit sizes does ASMS provide?
items.a: We offer three unit sizes: Small (14.85 m³), Medium (26.4 m³), and Large (38.4 m³). All are designed with modern layouts to suit different storage needs.

items.q: Where is ASMS located and is 24/7 access available?
items.a: Our facility is at 375 Vo Nguyen Giap, An Phu, Thu Duc City. You can access your storage unit 24/7 using your personal key or access card.

items.q: What security measures does ASMS have?
items.a: Our facility is equipped with 24/7 surveillance, motion sensors, private locks for each unit, and modern alarm systems to keep your belongings secure.
Yes. ASMS provides both standard and air-conditioned units (kept between 23–25°C). The air-conditioned ones are ideal for items like wood, fabric, and mattresses.

items.q: Do I need to pay a deposit?
items.a: Yes. A refundable deposit is required, depending on the unit size and rental duration.
For safety reasons, you may not store weapons, explosives, illegal goods, live animals, food, or items with strong odors.

items.q: How do I estimate how much space I need?
items.a: As a rule of thumb, 1m³ holds about 6 standard boxes. Choose a unit slightly larger (1–2m³ extra) than your estimate for easier organizing. Contact ASMS for personalized advice!
